name: One Armed Bandit (Mrlegoboy)
description:
A desolate Island crawling with undead. a hero with a strange power and a troubled past. 

a very simple (and admitedly unfinished) platformer I made. you play as a masked hero with only one working arm. press e or click to build momentum in the dead arm to swing the sword at enemies.

can you defeat the boss at the top of the island?
